title: Mystery Science Theater 3000 MST3K Season11 s11 BluRay AVC AC3
description: Mystery Science Theater 3000 MST3K Season11 BluRay AVC AC3 DEFAULT AUDIO IS TRACK1 5.1 SURROUND - TRACK2 IS 2.0 STEREO SUBS ARE SOFTWARE ENCODED AND OFF BY DEFAULT OPENING/CLOSING PRODUCTION LOGOS WERE REMOVED SO THE ENCODE IS ~17-18SECONDS SHORTER Mystery Science Theater 3000 The Return Season11 BluRay (2017) x264 video: 1920x1080 AVC preset=veryslow 8bit CRF: average=22.55 range=20.25-25.25 bitrate: average~5122kbps range=3582kbps-6871kbps audio1 (default): English AC3 5.1 Surround 640kbps audio2: English AC3 2.0 Stereo 224kbps subs: English built in, off by default, software switchable subs: S_HDMV/PGS Picture based subtitle format used on BDs/HD-DVDs (no OCR) source: Blu-Ray Riffers: Jonah Ray, Baron Vaughn (Tom Servo), Hampton Yount (Crow T. Robot) logos: intro and outro logos removed except for part of SOL logo at end 14 episodes plus 1 documentary extra bonus (docu 2ch only with no subs) 21hours 58minutes 11seconds 59,291,009,716bytes 2017.04.17 Netflix Release 2018.04.17 Blu-Ray Release https://www.imdb.com/title/tt6782014/ These are x264 AVC with AC3 audio encodes of the Mystery Science Theater 3000 The Return Season11 BluRay box set. Constant quality RF = 22.50 was used unless the resulting encode was too large (over 7000kbps) or too small (under 3500kbps). In those cases the RF was adjusted so the encode was just within the desired range of 3500kbps-7000kbps. The audio was sourced from DTS-HD 5.1 and the subtitles are passthrough from the BluRay (i.e. no OCR). The subtitles are italics for riffing and they note who is riffing - Jonah, Crow, or Tom - and if they are speaking or singing. The following logos were removed or shortened so when playing an episode it immediately starts with an SOL establishing shot. After the stinger scene at the end of the episode, 3.5seconds of the silent Satellite of Love LLC logo is shown and then the episode ends. The documentary was fully encoded including the opening and closing logo. Including some removed beginning and ending black frames, the total change in time is about 17-18seconds less for each episode compared to the BluRay. Opening logo: *Netflix(open) ~5sec - completely removed Closing logos: * Satellite of Love LLC ~4.0sec - shortened by ~0.5sec * Abominable Pictures ~1.9sec - completely removed * Shout Factory ~4.0sec - completely removed * Netflix(close) ~5.3sec - completely removed Please check out other shares of MST3K, Cinematic Titanic, The Film Crew, Rifftrax, Battlestar Galactica, DC Comics, Gotham, Star Trek, Star Wars, audiobooks, documentaries, music and more at your favorite sharing sites. Thanks
